sentence.Network_en: Proctitis is common in patients undergoing pelvic radiation therapy.
sentence.Network_cn: 直肠炎常见于骨盆放射治疗的病人.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of radiation proctitis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨放射性直肠炎的诊断与治疗.

sentence.Network_en: May be related to proctitis and a variety of pathogenic microorganisms relevant to intestinal invasion.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能与直肠炎及多种病原微生物对肠道的侵袭有关.

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of the rectum; marked by bloody stools and a frequent urge to defecate; frequently associated with Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis
